event.title: March 30, 2009 Richmond native Jeff Hamilton plies

data.event: BY RACHEL E. SHEELEY STAFF WRITER March 30, 2009 Richmond native Jeff Hamilton plies the drumsticks.

event.title: will appear on national television this week

data.event: Hamilton will appear on national television this week to help promote singer Diana Krall's CD "Quiet Nights," on which he performs.
Hamilton will appear on national television this week to help promote singer Diana Krall's CD "Quiet Nights," on which he performs.
